summary: An Englishman is left with an abandoned, very tame, and domesticated pet alligator, who helps him develop a bond with a young Irishwoman. Plans to get rid of the animal cause mayhem and produce a surprising outcome for all.
cast: Donald Sinden|Diana Dors|Jeannie Carson|James Robertson Justice|Stanley Holloway|Roland Culver|Margaret Rutherford|Avice Landone|Stephen Boyd|Richard Wattis|Henry Kendall|Michael Shepley|Ken Mackintosh & His Band|Arnold Bell|Paul Beradi|Patrick Cargill|Charles Carson|Cyril Chamberlain|Alan Coleshill|Anne Cooke|Larry Dann|Jimmy Edwards|Violet Farebrother|Colin Freear|Harry Green|Gilbert Harding|Victor Harrington|John Harvey|Joan Hickson|George Howell|Robert Howell|Frankie Howerd|Jemma Hyde|Maurice Kaufmann|Wilfrid Lawson|Aileen Lewis|Ken Mackintosh|Edie Martin|Martin Miller|Prince Monolulu|George Moon|Myrette Morven|Jack Newmark|Nicholas Parsons|Una Pearl|Tony Selby|Bill Shine|Guy Standeven|Ronnie Stevens|Gareth Tandy|Ernest Thesiger|John Vere|Charles Victor|Sandra Walden|Carol White|George Woodbridge|Joan Young
director: Director: J. Lee Thompson (as J. Lee-Thompson)
title: An Alligator Named Daisy
